content.p: The On-Campus Medical Clinic is operated by Kumpulan Medic, an independent health provider, whereby a fee will be charged for consultations. If required, the centre is also able to dispense medicines and arrange for laboratory tests. This network ensures that professional staff are always on hand to help you tackle issues as they arise during your time at the university. Students are also reminded that the trafficking and use of illegal drugs is a capital offence in Malaysia. Any student with a drug-related problems is urged to seek advice from the doctor at the On-Campus Medical Clinic and/or the student counsellor. Location: Student Association Building, First Floor Tel: +6 03-89248089 Opening hours during MCO: Monday - Friday: 8.30am - 5pm Saturdays: 9am - 1pm Sun & Public Holidays: Closed. Normal opening hours: Monday - Friday: 8:30am - 5pm Saturdays: 10am - 1pm Sun & Public Holidays: Closed. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
